about.title: The House Project
text: We are a private collective of investors and design visionaries creating one-of-a-kind homes in exceptional locations — from the coastlines of Spain and Montenegro to the tropics of Thailand and the hills of California.
Each residence blends soulful modern architecture with natural light, sculptural lines, and timeless materials — built for beauty, efficiency, and lasting value.
We build on elevated sites with breathtaking views of the sea and mountains, designing every home with the same care as if it were our own.

These aren’t just properties.
They’re places you’ll want to call home.

spain.title: Villa Thalassa
text: Perched atop a hill within the protected Reserva del Al Cuz Cuz nature reserve, Villa Thalassa commands uninterrupted, south-facing views of the Mediterranean Sea.

Set on a 3,000 m² estate, this extraordinary residence offers 12 bedrooms and a wealth of high-end amenities, including a fully equipped gym, sauna, private cinema, spa zone, dance floor with DJ bar, cigar lounge, and a four-car garage.
Outside, expansive terraces and landscaped gardens surround the property, which is powered by a self-sustaining 50kW solar energy station.

kotor.title: The House
text: Set on a hillside above the Bay of Kotor — Europe’s southernmost fjord — The House is a residential compound of five architecturally distinct buildings.

Designed with seismic resilience in mind, the structures feature monolithic frames and brick infill. The 300 mm travertine-clad exterior walls are built over a four-layer “warm ceramics” system that ensures top-tier thermal insulation, waterproofing, and acoustic performance.

thailand.title: Villa Shanti
text: A luxury private 1,000 m² villa set in Koh Samui’s most exclusive development.
This cliffside retreat offers complete privacy, sleek contemporary architecture, and an awe-inspiring 180° panoramic sea view — a unique escape where modern living meets natural beauty.

usa.title: Villa Om
text: Refined coastal luxury. An icon of California living.
Tucked between dramatic cliffs and secluded beaches, this private 1,200 m² villa offers rare scale, bold architecture, and cinematic views — in one of the most exclusive enclaves on the West Coast.
